column2: BRIEF-Loews Corp Declares Qtrly Dividend Of $0.0625/Share Of Common Stock May 12 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * DECLARATION OF QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.0625 PER SHARE OF COMMON STOCK, PAYABLE JUNE 9, 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Files For Offering Of $500 Million 3.200% Senior Notes Due 2030 May 7 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * LOEWS CORP FILES FOR OFFERING OF $500 MILLION 3.200% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2030 - SEC FILING Source: (bit.ly/2xJFHBP) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Files Prospectus Supplement Related To Potential Senior Notes Offering - SEC Filing May 6 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * LOEWS FILES PROSPECTUS SUPPLEMENT RELATED TO POTENTIAL SENIOR NOTES OFFERING - SEC FILING Source text for Eikon: [ID: bit.ly/3frRc1Z] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Posts Q1 Loss Per Share Of $2.20 May 4 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * ORATION REPORTS NET LOSS OF $632 MILLION FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2020 * BOOK VALUE PER SHARE DECREASED TO $60.28 AT MARCH 31, 2020 FROM $65.71 AT DECEMBER 31, 2019 * ECONOMIC DISRUPTION CAUSED BY COVID-19 PANDEMIC & MEASURES TO MITIGATE SPREAD OF VIRUS SIGNIFICANTLY AFFECTED CO’S RESULTS IN Q1 OF 2020 * EXPECT TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT NON-CASH LOSS IN Q2 OF 2020 IN CONNECTION WITH DECONSOLIDATION OF DIAMOND OFFSHORE * CARRYING VALUE OF DIAMOND OFFSHORE AS OF MARCH 31, 2020 WAS $1.0 BILLION, NET OF TAX Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Carrying Value Of Diamond Offshore Drilling, Other Units $1.5 Bln on Dec 31 April 27 (Reuters) - Diamond Offshore Drilling Inc: * LOEWS - LOEWS’S CARRYING VALUE OF DIAMOND OFFSHORE DRILLING & SOME OF ITS UNITS, AT DEC 31, 2019 WAS $1.5 BILLION * LOEWS - IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR, & DOES NOT PROVIDE GUARANTEES OF, LIABILITIES & OBLIGATIONS OF ITS UNITS, INCLUDING DIAMOND * LOEWS - EXPECTS TO RECORD IN Q2 A NON-CASH LOSS FOR DIFFERENCE BETWEEN CARRYING VALUE, ESTIMATED FAIR VALUE OF INTEREST IN DIAMOND AS OF APRIL 26 * LOEWS - TO NO LONGER CONTROL DIAMOND FOR ACCOUNTING PURPOSES, DIAMOND TO BE DECONSOLIDATED FROM CO'S CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS EFFECTIVE APRIL 26 Source text for Eikon: [ID:bit.ly/359OhGg] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Corporation Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.73 Feb 10 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $ 3,876 MILLION VERSUS $ 3,287 MILLION * BOOK VALUE PER SHARE INCREASED TO $65.71 AT DECEMBER 31, 2019 FROM $59.34 AT DECEMBER 31, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Bandera Partners Issues Letter To Loews' Board Regarding Boardwalk Pipeline May 21 (Reuters) - Bandera Partners: * BANDERA PARTNERS ISSUES PUBLIC LETTER TO BOARD OF LOEWS CORPORATION REGARDING BOARDWALK PIPELINE PARTNERS * SAYS OWNS 1.6 MILLION COMMON UNITS OF BOARDWALK PIPELINE PARTNERS * SAYS BELIEVE LOEWS SHOULD NOT BE PERMITTED TO PURCHASE BOARDWALK’S UNITS AT A PRICE LESS THAN $13.14 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Corp Sets Quarterly Dividend Of $0.0625per Share May 8 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * LOEWS CORPORATION ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK * SETS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND OF $0.0625PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Loews Corp Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.89 April 30 (Reuters) - Loews Corp: * ORATION REPORTS NET INCOME OF $293 MILLION FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.78 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $3,581 MILLION VERSUS $3,300 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
